title: CNBC Daily Open: Growth stocks look hot but investors should be wary
description: The Nasdaq had its sixth positive week in seven. Yet further interest rate hikes by the  Federal Reserve seem imminent. Markets may be too optimistic.

title: 'Digital nomads' can now live in Spain with their families — if they earn enough
description: Spain launched a visa aimed at "international teleworkers," which lets so-called digital nomads live and work there if they meet the requirements.

title: Meta is rolling out a new paid verification subscription service for Instagram and Facebook users
description: Meta announced a new paid verification subscription service for $11.99 a month on the web and $14.99 a month on iOS.

title: Marvel's 'Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania' snares $104 million during domestic debut
description: Disney and Marvel Studio's "Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania" tallied $104 million in domestic ticket sales during its opening weekend.

title: Fox News execs blocked Trump from doing Jan. 6 interview amid Capitol riot, filing shows
description: Fox News executives vetoed Trump from going on air Jan. 6, 2021, when hundreds of his supporters invaded the U.S. Capitol.

title: U.S. officials address mounting tensions between U.S. and China during Munich Security Conference
description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken met with China's top diplomat, Wang Yi, on the margins of the Munich Security Conference.

title: Inside Peloton's rapid rise and bitter fall — and its attempt at a comeback
description: Peloton used to be the toast of Wall Street. Now, under CEO Barry McCarthy, it's a year into an aggressive turnaround that has altered the company's identity.
